name: FullContact
description: FullContact provides a cloud-based contact management solution for businesses, developers, and individuals. Using FullContact’s Cloud Address Book, contacts can be normalized, de-duplicated, merged, and enriched with social proufb01les. Users can create custom tags and searches to easily make targeted lists. Every version of every contact is automatically updated and contacts can be shared with any platform or other users.

apis.name: FullContact
apis.description: FullContact provides contact management APIs for data enrichment, secure cloud storage, intelligent merging, de-duplication, normalization, and much more.

apis.name: FullContact Card Reader
apis.description:
FullContact provides a suite of tools to support individuals, businesses, and developers in managing and enhancing their contact data. 
The FullContact Card Reader API provides developer access to a human-based business card transcription service. Customer applications post business card images and receive human transcribed structured data.

apis.name: FullContact CardShark
apis.description:
CardShark by FullContact is an application that allows users to take pictures of business cards and send them to be transcribed into their FullContact account.

The CardShark API allows developers to access and integrate the functionality of CardShark with other applications. Some example API methods include uploading cards, accessing requests, and managing cards and card information.

apis.name: FullContact Location Normalization API
apis.description:
FullContact provides a suite of tools to support individuals, businesses, and developers in managing and enhancing their contact data. 
The FullContact Location API allows customer applications to parse and structure semi-structured location data. The API is also capable of enriching incomplete location data by adding continent, population size, and other fields.

apis.name: FullContact Name API
apis.description:
FullContact provides a suite of tools to support individuals, businesses, and developers in managing and enhancing their contact data. 
The FullContact Name API allows customer applications to parse unstructured name data, deduce structured names from usernames and email addresses, return name statistics based on the UStpopulation, and to access a number of other name data enhancing features.
